html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-13622022-12-15,  ,  ,  TBS, 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectOrder Authorizing the Treasury Board to Provide Digital Platform Services
PrecisOrder authorizing the Treasury Board to provide digital platform services to (1) a department or agency of a province; (2) a municipality (3) a corporation, all of the shares of which are held by His Majesty in right of a province or by a municipality, or a wholly-owned subsidiary of such a corporation; and (4) a board or commission, established by His Majesty in right of a province or by a municipality, that performs an administrative or regulatory function of that province or municipality.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Authorizing the Treasury Board to Provide Digital Platform Services
precis: Order authorizing the Treasury Board to provide digital platform services to (1) a department or agency of a province; (2) a municipality (3) a corporation, all of the shares of which are held by His Majesty in right of a province or by a municipality, or a wholly-owned subsidiary of such a corporation; and (4) a board or commission, established by His Majesty in right of a province or by a municipality, that performs an administrative or regulatory function of that province or municipality.
